tool_description: Collects and organizes witness information including contact details, witness statements, and availability for follow-up interviews.

incident_id.description: Unique identifier of the incident report

witness_contacts.description: List of witness contact information in same order as names

witness_statements.description: List of initial witness statements in same order as names

interview_required.description: List indicating if follow-up interview needed for each witness

error_messages: Array length mismatch: witness_names, witness_contacts, and witness_statements must have the same number of elements.
Invalid incident ID: Provide a valid incident_id that exists in the system.
Missing witness information: Each witness must have a name, contact, and statement.
Interview requirements mismatch: interview_required array must match the number of witnesses if provided.
Statement too short: Each witness statement must be at least 15 characters long.
usage: Provide the incident_id and arrays of witness information ensuring all arrays have matching lengths. Optionally specify which witnesses need follow-up interviews. The tool organizes witness data for the investigation.

follow_up_needed.description: Number of witnesses requiring follow-up interviews
